seo.title: Contact | SustainSage
seo.description: Book a calm, bilingual intro conversation with SustainSage. Share your needs and we will respond with options, consent boundaries, and next steps.

hero.title: Contact & next steps
hero.subtitle: Tell us what you are navigating. We reply within two UK working days and only use your details to arrange coaching conversations.
hero.imageAlt: Illustration of scheduling a coaching session

intro: You do not need a perfect story or long explanation. A few honest lines about where you are and what you hope for are enough.

highlights.title: What to expect
highlights.intro: A short overview before you send your note.

items.title: Timely response
items.description: We reply within two UK working days with suggested times for a 20-minute intro call.

items.title: Data stays private
items.description: Your details are used only to arrange coaching and are deleted if we do not start working together.

items.title: No hard sell
items.description: If coaching is not right, we will suggest other services such as therapy, legal, immigration, or financial support.

form.title: Send us a note
form.subtitle: Please share as much or as little detail as feels comfortable.
form.name: Name
form.helpHint: It’s helpful to include context, but “I’m not sure yet” is also welcome.
form.timezonePlaceholder: e.g. GMT+8 evenings, or UK lunchtime
form.consent: I consent to SustainSage contacting me about coaching. I understand my details are used only for this purpose and handled with confidentiality, with legal or safeguarding exceptions.
form.privacyNote: We store your information only for the purposes of contacting you about coaching and delete it if we do not begin working together, unless law requires otherwise.

status.success: Thank you. We’ll reply within two UK working days.
status.error: Something went wrong. Please try again or email contact@sustainsage.com.
status.errorRequired: Please complete the required fields and confirm consent.

afterSubmit: We usually reply within 2 working days with a link to book a free 20-minute intro call.
In that call, we check fit, clarify boundaries, fees and languages. You decide calmly whether to go ahead.
If coaching is not the right support, we will say so honestly.

consent.label: Consent & boundaries
points: Your details are used only to contact you about coaching.
Coaching is not therapy, counselling, medical, legal, immigration or financial advice.
We follow the ICF Code of Ethics, including confidentiality with legal and safety exceptions.

sidebar.title: What happens next
sidebar.description: After your message we will propose times for a 20-minute intro session to confirm fit and next steps.
sidebar.responseCopy: Expect a reply within two UK working days—often sooner.
sidebar.privacyCopy: Your information remains private except where law or safeguarding requires disclosure.
sidebar.nextCopy: We align on goals, boundaries, fees, and whether coaching or another service is the right next step.
